35558920.review:
Rpg de corte clasico en la linea de los antiguos Final Fantasy 7/X con sus combates por turno con barra de espera, habilidades y ataques limite de cada jugador, una maravilla!
Tiene una historia interesante por lo que llevo jugado, el nivel artistico de los personajes y enemigos es increible digno del gran Joe Madureira siguiendo la estela de Darksiders.El juego esta en completo español tanto textos como voces en algunas secuencias importantes de la historia, y eso se agradece muchisimo.
El juego permite repetir las mazmorras principales del modo historia en distintas dificultades para obtener asi mas exp y equipo de distinta calidad (verde, azul, morado, rojo) como si de un diablo/wow tratase, de esta forma invita a farmear la misma zona.
Con las 12horas que llevo jugadas ya he descubierto algunas zonas secretas como buen rpg, que para poder avanzar te pide materiales que tienes que buscar o crear en otros luegares, para volver en un futuro! Tambien el juego cuenta con un modo de misiones de caceria como FF X/12 con enemigos bastante duros que te obligan a subir de nv y equipar mejor los pj para salir airoso de la batalla^^
Y como punto final el juego cuenta tambien con una arena de supervivencia donde vamos avanzando y consiguiendo premios (accerorios, objetos, equipo)
Por 20€ el juego vale muchisimo la pena, y es una lastima no encontrar mas titulos como este hoy dia.

35553962.review:
While i really really like the game.. sadly i could not get past the first dungeon because every time I approached the boss scene the game crashed. In every mode i tried. So even though the game is nice ... i can not enjoy it at the moment. This is the first time I had a game breaking bug in a looooong while. Will not refund it though in hopes of a fix.
p.s. for some reason steam thinks i got the game for free O_o

p.p.s. ok a small update. I did manage to find a workaround and continue playing. Solution was pretty simple - delete all the files from steamapps\common\Battle Chasers Nightwar\BC_Data\StreamingAssets\Video
seems like the game crashes when it tries to run the video file for the boss fight. So... you remove it .. and then skip the black screen. Done... you can continue playing.

I will leave negative mark for now so that (hopefully) this review helps someone to overcome similar problem. 

Oh and artwork+music are simply awe inspiring!!!
Cheers.

p.p.p.s. ok, changed the review for a plus as I can play the game and will finish it one of these days.
All in all I had quite fun experience, though with certain drawbacks.
Some said the game is grindy but IMHO that is not true. I have finished all the dungeons twice at most. And stayed in the level of the mobs for the new territory. Fights were pretty balanced till I hit around 26 and got to the last zone past Iris... At this point even without legendary i usually killed stuff in 1-2 attacks with Gar... and in case I did not use taunt on Gully THEY killed me with 1-2 attacks. Not .. fun. And then I crafted his legendary blade and.. well... started to oneshot everything, including bosses -___-  Again.. this is WITHOUT grinding at all. So grind is the least of the problems.
Heroes have lots of attacks... most of them are CREATED for certain chains... weaken - add extra dots.. dots provide bonuses etc. The idea itself is very nice. Realisation is so so. Well ... ok ... the actual usefulness is simply horrific :( All those skills.. chains ... dots .. combinations... they are completely useless. You dont need them because... you either kill stuff with 1-2 attacks... or you die to aoes (first time I encoutered hangman my party was wiped out due to absence of aoe cleance... due to his dot). You hit enemies super hard... enemies hit you super hard. Without Gully most of your guys die to 1-2 attacks with ease. Yeah ... you can use Red as a sub tank but that is a meh idea with random evades... you miss 1 attack and you have to heal her asap or your party is dead. 

TLDR. To make this more fun you need to LOWER your dmg and mob dmg. Add resistances to mobs (so that those dots/ bleeds are useful!). And if you do that - add animation boosters as well. I would like the fights to be longer.. much longer... but in that case I would like animations to be somewhat faster as well ))

35553783.review:
Really cool game, but has bugs which render it unplayable for me since they destroy my saves or just prevent it from saving at all.

I was a Kickstarter supporter of this game and was really happy to get started with the beta when it came out. I played for 4+ hours in one go after installing it, and definitely loved the art, the (admittedly fairly simple and easy) gameplay and overall polish level. I got through the second dungeon at level 10 or so, popped open the menu, and quit for the night...

..The next morning, I opened the game, loaded my save and found myself at level 2, sitting right outside the tutorial. Apparently it hadn't saved in those four hours and my progress was all gone.

I tried again after the public release, in case they had fixed the issue (No mention of it in the patch notes!). I progressed up to the first dungeon and level 4, experiencing one crash along the way (the game froze at the start of a battle, requiring me to quit out). No big deal, saves appeared to work normally. Entered the first dungeon, and 3 rooms in I got the same start-of-combat bug. Annoying, but OK... I quit, restarted the game, and found that my save file is now corrupted and I have to start over completely, again.

Please don't spend your money on this until Airship can identify and fix the damn thing. Once it's fixed it'll probably be worth your while.

우선 그래픽은 원작 만화랑 아주 흡사할정도로 좋게 말하자면 깔끔하면서 간결하고 나쁘게 말하자면 2017년에 나온게임치고 조금 촌스러움 

레벨링이 굉장히 오래걸리지만 그 과정에서 몹 때려잡는 맛이 굉장히 쏠쏠함
레벨을 막론하고 던전을 영웅난이도 이상으로 돌려면 1시간은 족히 걸림

스토리는 그냥 아무것도 없고 '나쁜놈 때려 잡는다!' 딱 이수준 근데 이리저리 꼬아놓고 설정오류 나서 허술해 보이는것보다는 이게 낫다고 생각함

35544929.review:
Solid 8.5 / 10 Dungeon Crawler with some nice tactical gameplay and shallow story.

The game is like the comic books: More style then content. It looks and sounds fantastic with a nice touch to details like the short stop before you hit an enemy.

Lots of lootables, craftables and ways to develop your heroes. Tons of different enemy types that you can grind in order to receive bonuses. Different difficulties that result in bigger rewards.

The development team listens closely to its community and already works on some quality of life improvements.

My only cons with this game:

- story is ok, nothing more. But the comic had the same issue: Style over substance.
- can become grindy
- no passive leveling for side characters you do not use. Results in aforementioned grind, if you want to try out different compositions.

Other than that, the game is ok and in the first 4.5 hours I have not seen anything that was too difficult, I rather find it too easy at the moment. But I guess it will become more challenging, soon.

Review:
Immersive gameplay,outrageously fantastic models/graphics/ambience, captivating sounds/music, and  rich with dynamic interaction and objective driven storylines. Plenty of time, and real estate to farm/grind if you wish get a little OP before moving ahead, but also complimentary of it's own chronological progression if you want to aggressively move through the game's main story. In terms of extras, the enchanting, blacksmithing, and training are all worthy addons that don't feel like an afterthought as they do in other games; and fishing is a nice little touch. Once you have "fished-out" all the currency (shadow tokens) it doesn't really serve a purpose, but that was ok for me. My only negative critique is that some of the champions aren't very useful. They feature fun abilities, great graphics, and have plenty of personality, but ultimately fall short in combat effectiveness. At the end of the day,  I've paid a lot more for a lot less because of hype etc. This is a GREAT game. NOTE: I suggest playing with a controller if you have one. Works fine with a keyboard, but it's just a bit clunky.

35540045.review:
Bonne surprise sur ce jeu, la DA le rend vraiment charmant avec ses graphismes chatoyants et le style BD omniprésent.
Le système de combat (tour par tour) est assez tactique en fait, on ne s'en rend compte dès que les combats deviennent plus corsés et que nos compétences s'étoffent. Le choix d'une compétence ou d'une autre influe sur la barre d'initiative, avec un effet retard plus ou moins fort, cela oblige à cogiter pas mal  sur les boss.

Le craft est présent sans être passionnant mais  il permets de petits bonus. La montée des personnages est assez simple, le groupe est limité à 3 et c'est assez basique (tank, healer, dps), mais le système de talents et l'équipement permet des orientations un peu plus mixées.

Pour finir, quelques bémols, l'histoire est assez insiginifiante et très très linéaire, les quêtes annexes sont... annexes :). Et au bout d'une quinzaine d'heures le côté répétitif se fait ressentir.

Je recommande pour le côté addictif à un rythme qui est assez posé en fait.

35537990.review:
!!EDIT!!
It turns out despite trying my best to fix the problem and just being unable to, people with similar systems did not run into the problems I've been havin. I don't hate the game - in fact I love it - and I don't want to spread misinformation. Still the problems I encountered are real and did taint my experience, take it with a grain of salt though and consider that even if you have a similar system as I do you could be fine. "do I feel lucky? Well do you punk?" - Dirty Harry

Battle Chasers: Nightwar is the most fun I've had with a "broken" game ever. 
I cannot denie that the combat and custumization of skills are amazing and the charakter design gloriously over the top in the best of ways. If you care about nothing else this game is pure gold. Yet I cannot overlook the consistent performance problems I have been getting reguardless of graphics options resolution and windowed/fullscreen modes. Yes I have tried turning the system off and on again. 
I might not have the most powerful machine in the world but an i7 and a 970gtx should be able to handle this game and in dungeons where there is aruguably more going on they can - no problem. Rock solid 60 fps around 90% of the time. on the overworld however I would get constant (and boy do I mean constant) stuttering and freezeframes. To me as a programming noob this looks like poor optimization. 
It may be added that on a european keyboard some of the standart keybindings are nonsense (the whole xz thing) and the game does not allow me to rebind that. From the way that some of the buttons overlap I would guess it was designed for a controller. I also thought the english voice acting and soundtrack where a little underwhealming. Nothing major though. 
None of the last things would be able to take away from a whole hearted recommendation, unfortunately the framerate has not been fixed in four days wich leads me to believe that it either is a big complex problem or the dev does not care. Either way it does not look like its going to be fixed any time soon so for the time being, I can not recommend this game on the PC platform (no idea about consoles sorry). I look foreward to updating this review.

35537140.review: [i]Для описания данной игры будет достаточно одной фразы - "дешево и сердито", ни больше, ни меньше. Гибридная игровая механика поначалу радует, а стильный комиксовый арт качественно выделяется на фоне огромного количества низкопробных инди поделок, которые поголовно выглядят как мазня первоклассника на уроке ИЗО. Правда, как обычно водится у западных разработчиков, понятие JRPG авторы восприняли слишком буквально. Ведь это не просто бои стенка на стенку, этот жанр любят во многом за сюжет и персонажей. Здесь с этим очень плохо: комиксовый сюжет не обладает прописанностью, а персонажи сплошь картонные болванчики с одной эмоцией. Постановки почти нет, - всю игру одни болтающие картонки. Контента категорически мало. Гринд быстро начинает надоедать, потому что сделан слишком поверхностно и скупо. Даже рыбалку умудрились сделать скучной, что удивительно. В итоге: проходняк на твердую семерочку, у которого было все, чтобы стать чем-то большим.[/i]

35536792.review:
Battle Chasers: Nightwar basiert auf einer Comic-Reihe, die von 1998 - 2001 vornehmlich in den USA erschien und daher eher unbekannt sein dürfte. Die 5 fest vorgegebenen Protagonisten und entsprechende Rahmenhandlung entspringen daher dieser Vorlage.

Battle Chasers wird zum Genre des JRPG (japanische Rollenspiele) gezählt und ist daher am ehesten mit z.B. Spielen wie Chrono Trigger oder Final Fantasy IV zu vergleichen.

Man steuert eine Gruppe aus drei Helden (die später aus einem Pool von 6 zur Verfügung stehenden Persönlichkeiten gewählt werden können), mit denen man die Welt erkundet und rundenbasierte Kämpfe bestreitet, die den Hauptteil der spielzeit beanspruchen.

Wie in jedem klassischen Rollenspiel gewinnen die Helden an Erfahrung und steigen im Level auf, erlernen neue Fertigkeiten und können bessere Ausrüstung tragen. Dabei ist quasi jedem der verfügbaren Charaktere eine feste Rolle vorgegeben. So ist z.B. der sanfte Kriegsgolem Calibretto entgegen der optischen Annahme der priorisierte Heiler, das toughe Mädchen Gully der Tank und die Piratin Monika eine der Damage Dealer.
Jeder der Charaktere kann dazu im rundenbasierten Kampf neben den Standardangriffen aus einem umfangreichen Repertoire an Fähigkeiten und Zaubern wählen, die nach un nach freigeschaltet werden.

Die Kämpfe selber laufen "JRPG klassisch" ab, d.h. unser Team steht auf der linken Bildschirmseite, die Gegner rechts. Der Reihe nach (die sich durch den Wert "Eile" bestimmt) ist nun jede Figur am Zug und kann eine Aktion ausführen. Mit fortschreitender Kampfdauer kann man starke Komboangriffe seiner Truppe aufbauen, die aber auch Gegner beherrschen können.
Insgesamt spielen sich die Kämpfe sehr flott und taktisch, optisch sind die Figuren und Gegner/Monster ausgezeichnet in Szene gesetzt.

Zwischen den Kämpfen erkundet man die Welt in Echtzeit in speziellen Dungeons bzw. auf der etwas kargen Weltkarte. Dort kann man Händler besuchen und Aufträge bekommen, Gegenstände und Tränke herstellen sowie seine Ausrüstung optimieren.

Das Spiel zieht seine Faszination aus dem unkomplizierten Spielfluss, den liebevoll gestalteten Animationen und den z.T. sehr fordernden Kämpfen, vor allem gegen Bossgegner. Natürlich sitzt auch wieder die Jagd nach immer besserer Ausrüstung.

Jedem Freund von rundenbasierten RPGs sowie sowieso Fans der alten, klassischen Ära der JRPGs sei dieser Titel ans Herz gelegt..

35535954.review:
不要犹豫
这钱花的值
虽说目前还有一些小bug在 比如地下城内小事件，钓鱼做完后不刷新小地图提示；怪刷在奇怪的地方打不掉；地下城中召唤怪的怪物死了后依旧无法脱战；召唤出的怪物反隐。
但是总体玩起来非常流畅，翻译质量上乘，就我通关一遍的情况来说没有发现值得吐槽的地方。
地下城随机事件很有趣，场景中到处都有文本讲述整个岛屿的故事，剧情流玩家也可以玩得很有乐趣。
以下是游戏心得：
首先，无论你组什么队，机器人和猎魔人总得带一个，只有这2个家伙有战后恢复的天赋。
然后，在保证速度比怪快的前提下，堆攻击。
建议每个地下城打2次，打一次普通解锁困难后再打一次困难弄好装备后就可以去下个图浪了，打简单完全是浪费时间。
支线任务优先做，除非等级比你高。
如果boss感觉打不过的话请带上法师，点出冰属性普通攻击减速20%的天赋，给boss来3下后基本你的队伍行动2轮后boss才出手，高3级的boss也能虐过去，地下城中的精英怪也可以这么打。
做好以上这些可以有效提升游戏体验
这个游戏的每个角色都有好用的地方，只要有爱怎么选都是可以的。
但是中期盗贼小姐姐一发暗杀秒精英和boss也是事实。
后期法师天赋成型后一发3w的奥数风暴秒最终boss也是事实。
猎魔人的3级大招完全智障也是事实。

35533728.review:
For the price, it's honestly not worth it. The combat is very repetitive and boring due to the characters barely having any form of customisation to them in terms of giving the player the freedom to make the character what they want, and the game's pacing in terms of story is insanely SLOW - especially for the small size of the map, which is on rails by the way...
The gameplay requires barely any strategy, it's way too easy, and the game forces you to play the way it wants you to play. It's crazy linear, and that's bad in this day and age in my opinion for an RPG. The entire point of an RPG, is to give the player some form of freedom within a creative sandbox, and this game may aswell just have been a straight forward action game - the dev's should've stuck to making 'Darksiders'.

Another issue that's obviously there to help n00bz, is that you can only ever fight 3 enemies at once, and I honestly got fed up with it due to how easy I actually found the game. The slow pacing made it not possible for me to get a refund or else I would have my money back. It's like a weird mix of 'Darkest Dungeon' and 'Diablo' with random JRPG-style mechanics and elements thrown in there to claim that it's a JRPG when it's not - even FF13 was a more unique experience than this game... and that's REALLY saying something.

It's VERY grindy in terms of levelling and getting gear, and most of the gear for each character is practically the same so getting a new weapon etc. isn't anything to celebrate about, and the gear that you do get doesn't change a character's appearance, only the weapon does. The loot and crafting plays on the weird 'same but different' system that 'Darksiders II' and 'Borderlands' has, where you can pick up the exact same gear in terms of icon/model, but it has different statistics - I personally find this lazy, uncreative, and all that it is is an RNG-based stat system that isn't rewarding to a player at all. It's an old system that needs to be thrown out completely from RPG games because it's made the genre insanely stale. You won't find many unique weapons for each character like you would in a 'Final Fantasy' game, but if you like dungeon-based grindy games, then this one might be for you? It's definitely not for me.

The world map is another major issue - it's way too small... and it's on rails, yeah, an on-rails world map with barely any areas to explore. Games like 'Legend of Dragoon' did the whole 'on-rails world map' thing well because each area you went to was unique and different, whereas this game fails at this. The dev's obviously spent way too much time and money on aesthetics rather than creating any interesting content. The world map makes the game ridiculously linear due to how small it is and exploration is gimped for the most part because you're always on a straight path from which you're not allowed to leave so you never feel 'free' on the world map to do whatever you want to do. This is why RPG games like Skyrim etc. are still so revered amongst players. It's due to the freedom they offer to the player.

The game essentially forces you to continue with the story no matter what you do just to progress your characters, and the 'random encounters' aren't actually random at all, they're placed in front of you at all times so you know exactly what you're going to fight - even in dungeons. It's a shame that they decided on this, as the surprise of finding new and unique enemies is just thrown out of the window. Most of the enemies are just re-skinned versions of others enemies, which just shows that they ran out of ideas.

It has a turn-based system which is a carbon copy of the system that's in 'Final Fantasy X', where you can see who will go on what turn, so that's another 'GG EZ' mechanic for the people that don't want a challenge, but feels like 'Darkest Dungeon'. Essentially, this game has taken most of the challenge away due to the stupid design decisions that go against player freedom, and forces the player to play a certain way at all times. For that, I can't tell any RPG fan they need to play this, as there's no need.

The only reason people have given it amazing scores and reviews is because of the characters, art style, animations, and sound - the core gameplay and pacing is very bad. It's pretty much like the dev's didn't learn from 'Darksiders II' what-so-ever in terms of as to why people hated it. At it's core, it's a hand-holding simulator, and that honestly sucks. It's all style, and has barely any depth to it.

If you're like me, then you'll probably play it to see what all the fuss is about, and you more than likely won't ever complete it because of the negative reasons I stated above.

It's a 4/10 at best.

35532808.review:
O jogo só tem um problema na minha opinião, que pra muitos jogadores de RPG talvez não seja tudo aquilo.

Basicamente você tem três tipos de gameplay.
1. Combate Tatico, igual a todo RPG por turno, tem a ordem dos personagens, habilidades, ataques, combos e etc. Bem responsivo e a interfase é rápida.

2. Dungeons e outras areas internas, melhor parte do jogo, você anda com seus personagens em forma 3D, tem os inimigos no mapa(que ativam o combate tatico), armadilhas e puzzle. Ambiente bem bonito.

3. MINHA ÚNICA CRITACA AO JOGO, Movimentação pelo mapa. Um jogador de RPG deve estar acostumado, mas nesse game é chato jogar pelo mapa, você anda e interage, tem inimigos, itens pra coletar e lugares pra falar com NPC, a questão é que uma boa parte do jogo se passa nesse modo, tem muitos inimigos e acaba-se passando muito tempo nele. O jogo deveria ser mais focado nas gameplay 1 e 2 que citei.

Mas fora isso, é um ótimo RPG, ultimamente tem saido poucos RGP com tanta qualidade como esse. Traduzido em portugues e a Dublagem dos personagens é 10/10.

35532789.review:
一直以来都很喜欢回合制游戏，在商店看到这款游戏瞬间就被精美的画风吸引了，买了下来一玩就没停过，每次都是打完这个本就睡觉our。。 然后就是两个小时后了。
优点：精美的画风、UI、人物设计
          出色的装备设计，装备分绿、蓝、紫、橙色（至今还没掉过），加上各种特效附魔、装备自带特效，可玩性很强，得到装备的成就感、获得感很足
          出色的技能、天赋设计，制作组将游戏的技能、天赋成长的曲线设计的很好，让人有升级的动力，各种天赋、技能需要搭配起来能产生质变，需要玩家构建一套自己的人物、装备和技能
          出色的场景设计，大地图、小地图、副本设计很有特色，合理利用地下城技能可以降低游戏难度
缺点：游戏节奏有些慢，希望制作组在玩家达到一定等级后，可以设置一个2倍速按钮，或者可以跳过演出动画

目前玩到20级，分享些自己总结的攻略:
        1、游戏后期难度还是很高的，怪物成长曲线很高，队伍构成目前看来必须1T、1奶、1DPS，目前我的队伍组成是：艾莉、阿鲁高和女盗贼。
        艾莉感觉是必须带的，嘲讽+防御，吸收大部分伤害。
        奶为什么不带机器人带阿鲁高的原因，阿鲁高有个暴击回血的天赋，加之自身天赋暴击率，如果装备暴击率叠高了，可以做到既有DPS又可以奶人，阿鲁高本身有个20耗蓝伤害超高的技能，阿鲁高的第二爆发也是群体伤害加群体回血的神技，建议天赋点发左边点暴击率和暴击回血20点就够了，右边点增加治疗效果。
        DPS来说感觉女盗贼还是最高的，天赋加暴击率和暴击伤害，加上消耗过载可以增加暴击率，暴击可以叠中毒，第一个普攻可以随机叠出血、燃烧、寒冰、晕眩、破甲等效果，也是神技
       2、收藏家那儿换的货币建议先买紫色钓鱼竿和虫子，可以用很久，这样每个地下城的鱼塘都可以快速钓干净，而鱼可以换紫色货币，所以说是一笔很划算的投资。
       3、钓鱼小技巧，看鱼的尾巴位置，一般左键是一直按着的，然后尾巴朝哪儿键盘就往上或者下方向按，钓鱼线是蓝色说明方向对了，如果变红说明方向不对
       4、小地图显示有宝箱，就仔细找找，经常是有一些落灰的墙，可以用艾莉的地下城技能打破墙壁，拿到宝箱
       5、战斗总的来说还是要各种人物、技能、附魔搭配，需要玩家动脑经自己摸索，比如说机器人或者盗贼武器可以附魔一个点燃，然后用那种多次攻击的技能，基本上必然触发能触发几次，然后阿鲁高有一个技能是对点燃的敌人必然暴击，而阿鲁高暴击又可以帮队友回血，这就形成一种cmobo。天赋加点总的来说,加暴击率、加速度、加治疗效果、加效果过载叠特效的天赋比较好，艾莉可以放弃攻击，全部堆血量和防御。

35529743.review:
とりあえず、最初のダンジョン(塔？)をクリアしたところまで感想です。

楽しいｗ

「戦闘が遅い」というので心配していたのですが、戦闘時の紹介ムービーで流れているぐらいか、あれより若干早いかぐらいでした。
ただし今のところは「高速化」や「スキップ」、「戦闘自動化」等が無いので、ポチポチ押していきましょう。
あとは音声は出ませんが「戦闘開始時」や「戦闘終了後」にキャラクターが吹き出しで喋ってくれます。
「戦闘中」もランダムに何か言ってます(1ターンに１キャラ？)
戦闘は「味方側と敵側が交互に行動」ではなく、「フィールド上にいる”素早さの高いキャラター”から順に行動」です。
ですので「素早さ」が高ければ、連続行動もできるでしょうし、スタン系の攻撃で相手の行動順を遅らせることもできます。

エンカウント
これは「地図上の移動」と「ダンジョン内の移動」で違っていました。

「ダンジョン内」では基本的に敵が目に見える形で移動しています。(姿を薄くできる敵もいる様です)
こちらを見つけると「寄ってくる敵」や「去って行き、仲間を呼んでくる敵」など様々です。
どちらも直接接触することで、戦闘開始となります。

「地図上の移動時」はちょっと違い敵は移動しません。
というのも、この地図が「点」と「線」で構成されているからでしょう。
「ダンジョン」や「門」、「店」や「池」など要所は全て「点」として、それらを繋ぐ「道」は「線」として表現されています。(要所との距離が離れている場合、何でもないところに「点」が点在しています。)
この点の部分に「敵」や「物資」等のアイコンがポップアップしていて、「触れる」もしくは「指定されたボタンを押す」ことで「戦闘」や「アイテム回収」が始まるといった感じです。

どちらの敵も「倒したら復活しない」といことは無いと思いますが、地図上に現れる敵はポップアップに掛かる時間が長い様なので、レベル上げ等はダンジョンの方がイイと思います。
ダンジョンは入り直せば敵は復活しますし、ダンジョン内のアイテム、装備が落ちています。
何より入場時に難易度が選べます。

言語・音声
日本語対応済み、日本語音声も収録されています。
日本語もところどころで？と思う時はありますが、プレイ自体に支障をきたすことはありません。
音声は大分違和感を感じるキャラクターが多いですね。ただこのゲームは要所要所でムービーがあり、ザコ敵キャラも喋るので「同じ声優さんが使い分けし過ぎてヤバくなった」だけかも知れません。

気になる方は、タイトルメニューの方のオプションで変更可能です。
「表示言語」と「音声言語」を別々の言語にすることも可能なので、ご安心を。

長々と書いてきましたが、実はこのゲームはゲーム内で箱コンでいう「BACKボタン」などを押すと「ゲーム再開」「ゲーム終了」の間に「マニュアル」があり、開いてみるとしっかりした説明書が入っています。
こちらを読めば、問題点も減るでしょう。

では皆様、楽しいゲームライフを！！

--2017/10/08追記--

35528019.review: This is a crazy awsome RPG in the spirit of the classics of the PlayStaion 1. The combat is clasic, but feels modern. The comic was incredible too, and I've wondered if this was ever going to even be a thing as a game. I'm so amazed at how this turned out. Words just can not really describe just how much this feels like the kind of game we wish all the remakes and reboots were like for old RPGs. If you're a comic fan, fantasy fan, magic or steampunk, you're in for a phenomenal treat. If you're just a fan of the old-school JRPG, then this is going to sate all your disires.It does a pretty decent job catching you up, but I'd suggest going back and reading the 9 issues of the comic released in the early 00's, it was amazing, and will make the first hour-ish a non-stop squeal fest of fanboying at the references to the comic panels. And Joe Mad's art looks alive during gameplay, beyond how much his art style jumps off the printed page, this digital jump was done well from a readable page to playable game. simply awesome.

35526381.review:
Spannend-kuriose Geschichte: Joe Mad entwickelt den Comic Battle Chasers, wechselt dann in die Spielbranche, um Entwickler zu werden, gründet Vigil Games und veröffentlicht dort unter THQ-Flagge die herausragenden Darksiders-Teile. THQ geht pleite, damit verschwindet Vigil. Aus den Scherben entsteht Airship Syndicate. Die erinnern sich an den alten Battle Chasers-Comic, starten eine Kickstarter-Kampagne und entwickeln nach erfolgreicher Finanzierung Battle Chasers: Nightwar. THQ Nordic, die sich aus der THQ-Konkursmasse ein paar Sahnestückchen holen, werden der Publisher für Battle Chasers: Nightwar. 

Zum Spiel: Selten habe ich einen Titel gesehen, dessen Präsentation dermaßen gelungen ist. Nicht nur, dass der Comic-Stil perfekt eingefangen wurde, das Ding sieht von vorne bis hinten dermaßen durchpoliert und einfach nur hübsch aus, dass man sich schon ein wenig die Augen reiben muss. Dazu tolle und sehr gut lokalisierte Sprachausgabe, ein wirklich guter Soundtrack und ein unverwüstliches Spielprinzip, dessen Kampfsequenzen an Final Fantasy erinnern. Schön auch die unterschiedlichen Gruppenmitglieder, die nicht nur toll und mit viel Charakter in Szene gesetzt wurden, sondern auch mit indiviuellen Fähigkeiten aufwarten. Insgesamt ein wirklich schöner Titel, der sich für den Preis (aktuell ca. 30 Euro) mehr als lohnenswert ist.

Hier ein kurzes Anspiel-Video mit den ersten 40 Spielminuten: 

https://youtu.be/ZJIsSR0DDxg

35526214.review: Best new old school RPG on the Market :D

35525930.review: It can be extremely difficult to introduce a new game into a genre long dominated by one company and franchise, but Battle Chasers: Nightwar is a modern and expertly executed take on everything turn-based RPGs introduced to gamers so many years ago. It’s a reminder that old ways don’t have to die away; they just need the right people to hone in on what made the genre work in the first place.

올드 게이머의 향수가 잔뜩 묻어있는 턴제 알피지의 장점을 아주 잘살린 게임이다.

단점은 파티플레이가 스토리와 연계되어 여러 캐릭터를  의무적으로 플레이하게 하는 시스템이 없어서,

또 하나, 스토리와 전체맵이 빈약해서 후반으로 갈수록 몰입도가 떨어진다.

반복된다는 느낌을 받게 되나, 그외의 요소들이 훌륭하여 지루함은 덜하다.

35522575.review:
首先我是一个极度讨厌玩回合制游戏的人. 刚出来看到这个美漫和好评于是我打算试试！后来我就停不下来了！是一个很好玩而且需要动脑子时间走的真快.不快不慢的节奏导致我可以在电脑上坐上一整天.


                  *2010.10.7 将近38小时通关一周目 。 人物技能点没有上限！！！打完可以打二周目 最难的难度 所以理论上来说人物加点可以点满， 所以这小小的游戏竟然是爆肝游戏！！！ 我已经肝不动了 可以看我成就 你们加油 基本特殊事件 全部狩猎任务 我都能记住。不知道的小伙伴可以留言或者加我好友详细给你解释，游戏愉快！
                   
                   介绍+优点+游戏问题+个人看法+推荐打法+（隐藏东西）

  1.一共有6个人可以选择.后续会陆续出来 治疗的有2个 肉盾（T）有一个 还有个是DPS 可以这么理解.人物是加点来选择你想走的类型.我前期没发现.中期的时候看到可以走路线我试了试发现千万别一个角色走死一个方向！一共有2种方向加点！每个方向可以加点推荐2种加点一起加！而且是加比较重要的！推荐混合加点 这样会提高战斗效率比如 伤害率 暴击率 治疗这些比较稳天赋可以随时变换！（多动脑子！）
  
 2.因为自己游戏玩的比较多所以游戏中会有固定的套路出现！暗影商店刚去的时候 我最开始攒暗影币的时候最先就把鱼钩和诱饵买了.因为游戏当中会有钓鱼点买了过后可能很快速的钓鱼.鱼钩和诱饵有等级的！最好早点培养 暗影商店：推荐顺序 1.先买诱饵在买鱼钩 没必要浪费金币买鱼钩什么的 暗影商店买效率是最高的 原因：鱼更快上钩钓鱼效率加快卖的暗影币越多 才开始只有紫色 鱼钩最高级是15级诱饵是19级 人物等级满了23还是24级暗影商店会出橙色鱼钩和诱饵也是最终的 2. 自己喜欢的人物皮肤 3.技能点数后期需要！ 4. 开宝箱（谁叫你是欧洲人！）5.最后不推荐你买武器！！！ 卖的等级比较高 而且游戏中武器还是比较好拿！玩到后期会有传奇的武器图纸！ （想知道在哪里拿吗？下面告诉你！）
 
 3.橙色武器图纸每一个角色都有！ 在地图北边最上面的一个区域板块 在靠右的区域 有一个小地方是教堂！ 往右边走有一排书架 仔细找找 会摸出3个橙色武器图纸：一个是机器人 一个是双枪女 一个是剑士！还有一个隐藏机关在书架上打开有一个宝箱！

 4.暗影商店有2个物品.一个是大礼帽 （暂时还不知道有什么用也想不到）还有一个就是紫色的书卷那个书卷在一个地方有用！1.在地图的最右下角有一个传送点.往左边走有一个大门！大门左边和右边都有一个小地方可以进去探索！那个书卷在右边的地方使用！ 先进去在地上找书卷 找完过后在骨钢琴那里弹奏！一共就会有3个弹奏乐 就有3个宝箱出现当然买书卷的那个比较开的东西比较值钱（检测欧洲人品！我开的是剑士的蓝色武器27级的加攻击力很高！）
 
 5.说说狩猎场 里面的狩猎任务 . 下水道的那个任务很费钱哟！任务地点在地图下一到门那里进去探索后左边有一口井！1.需要先丢100块 对话第二次500块 对话第三次 需要乞丐乱炖 （妈蛋晚上说在劲爆点酒馆尼玛不是那里！）物品在酒馆买！！右边的最下面：乞丐乱炖！不过也需要在劲爆点酒吧买东西：朗姆酒！ 然后再去劲爆点酒吧下面的副本里面拿一个梯子！仔细找找在一个房间里面！就在传奇难度的第二张图.前面都不会遇到怪进去拿就好如果图没有变的话

 6.想必大家都去过劲爆点酒吧的2楼吧.上去后有2个破旧的机器点一下书籍会有一个任务 需要收集4个物品 后3个物品你不用担心会在后续的情节拿到东西.但是第一个东西：灌魔的什么石头需要在一个特定的地方刷出来 ！ 地方在：游戏地图黄色区域的地方有一个副本是矿的副本在下面有一个小地方居住着一个矿工！你需要在矿工那里对话 每次对话交出你一个矿石并给你100金币！需要反复对话.记得没错的话是3-4次 然后会给你一本灌魔制造书籍 还会有几个武器的制造图纸！然后这个任务就完成啦

 7.每一位人物都可以得到爆发三的技能！需要在狩猎场对话并打败一些人物 很简单基本都在一些地图的小地方上面（不是副本哟）剑士需要在竞技场打到一定的分数得到东西才可以觉醒！
 
 8.推荐你们把大部分的金币花在 商店升级特别是武器商店 武器图纸 附魔图纸 药品图纸 

 9.推荐你们解锁一个区域就跑一遍！再去打地下城 为什么？前期还好前2个副本我都是打的第二个难度 后面基本就开始只能从简单开始打！首先你把你新解锁的区域走一遍会有2～3个小地方 可以想去看看 因为会有宝箱开出一些你需要的武器 饰品 戒指等.相当于是一个过渡期！探索完你会发现再打地下城会得到一个特定的东西并且这个东西会在那些小地方所用到！
 
 10.好吧最后一个福利 当你解锁了游戏地图最上面的地方.白色的那块区域有一个迷宫！！！ 告诉你们怎么走！ 活动时间完成+3箱子完成+3个书籍完成得到一个全队伍英雄加点！看11

 11.箱子分别分布在迷宫的左边 右边 和上面！游戏开始时先走最左边的门然后一直往左边走 你会发现一个箱子！原路返回（自己摸索最近的路线！）来到最开始的地方走最后边的门进去后往下走数到第3个障碍物时往上面走有一个箱子！最后继续往上走一直走到迷宫边缘往左边走最后一个箱子！（路途中会看到出口） 书籍分布：最左边有一堆骨头里面有一个分页 第二道门进去会有一个 第三道门进去往上走会发现最后一个

 12.关于后期的问题 人物等级在20~23是一个过渡期而且正好最新的区域解锁，推荐大家先去打打之前的FB当然是最难的难度然后打完过后装备会有一个提升然后在看看自己还有哪里提升的再去竞技场打架会得到需要的东西弄好过后就可以前往下一个地图了！  

 缺点：
可玩性还是可以.惊喜和烧脑会有一点 自己莫名卡了一次BUG！上楼梯的时候掉在最下面😂！告诉你们一个很有用的BUG！中后期打不过地下城的敌人时候你感觉要团灭记得ESC保存并返回主菜单在进去会挽回你死亡的几百块！并且在副本门口你可以选在在酒馆休息一天再去消灭你遇到的苦难！（就是会有一点花费在跑的路上）


 这是我第一次测评这么多字的游戏 并且这么详细.希望大家喜欢 用手机打的手都打麻了.看到这么好的帖子并帮助你在游戏中解决了问题就点一个赞或者欢乐哟！ 差不多现在已经玩到80%还剩下最后2个区域 在地图的上面2块区域 后面打完了看有没有什么好东西就再跟进一下告诉你们！😀

35521542.review:
Un homenaje a los jrpg clásicos con aroma actual.
Battle chasers es lo nuevo de Joe y su equipo, antigüos integrantes de la ya inexistente vigil games y creadores de la saga darksiders. Se nota mucho que es del mismo equipo, artisticamente es precioso. El juego es totalmente adictivo y su progreso en mi opinión es de los mejores, aquí de verdad que necesitas todo lo que te ofrece (crafteo de armas y pociones, hacer las mazmorras mas de una vez, entre mas dificil mejor para tener un loot mas potente, etc). No es un juego dificil, pero tampoco nos regala nada.

La historia es lo suficientemente interesante como para seguirla. Como dije antes, artísticamente es precioso, la banda sonora es genial, los personajes cada uno de ellos están bien diferenciados con sus respectivas skills, ventajas, items, etc.

¿Te gusta los jrpg clásicos como FF VII, VIII o IX entre otros? Este es tu juego. Incluso diría que si te gusta los juegos por turnos, en los que no solo tienes que apretar atacar para avanzar. Sin duda un juego muy a tener en cuenta.

The itch to explore a new world and loose yourself within it. Fighting enemies for a cause and finding treasure along the way. I haven't felt that itch being scratched more then with Battle Chasers: Nightwar.

If you enjoy JRPG's, Turn-Based Combat (with a surprisingly deep amount of strategy) and Exploration this is the game for you. Worth the $30 US? Yes, it is friends.

35517629.review:
I haven't played too much of the game yet, but after putting in six hours into it I can say that this is a well crafted game. The gameplay is simplistic and easy to get into. The characters and environment are vibrant and detailed. I've been a fan of Joe Mad for a while and seeing his work flourish in this game brings me back. The animations are incredible, and Garrison is still a bad ass. 
The only "negative" (mostly quipy) thing I can say about the game that it's a little too simple. Camera angles/animations aren't varied so you're stuck to seeing the same cinematic for each action or burst. It would be neat to see a more dynamic camera come in especially when a critical hit happens to add more impact. Another peeve would be more an immersion thing like Calibretto swarmed with birds during his victory pose and they're in the middle of the sewers. Adding some variety when it comes to the environment would prove a boon to the visuals. Again, these are super minor. I highly recommend this game.

35515050.review:
古き良きJRPGです。

演出、アニメーション共にクオリティが高くかっこいいです。
パーティは3人編成で2人外すことになります。それぞれに得意な役割があるため編成を考えるのが楽しいです。
スキルもそれぞれ2パターンのルートがあり、ポイントを自由に振り直すこともできるので、装備やダンジョンに合わせて戦略を練ることができます。

UI、吹き替えのローカライズがしっかりしています。直訳のようなところは無く、しっかりストーリーに没入できます。
豪華声優ではありませんので演技はまぁ…棒読みなこともありますがよくできている方だと思います。結構喋ります。
ダンジョン毎に難易度を選ぶことができます。私は初見からハードでやりましたが、なんとかクリアできるというくらいで丁度いいです。

アイテム作成・武器に特性を付けるなど合成要素も奥深いです。
普段からハイスピードなゲームをプレイしている人には遅いと感じるのかもしれませんが、特に不満はなく楽しめています。

35515041.review:
Mechanically, Battle chasers has the influence from late ‘90s Final Fantasy and its ilk is clear, though with enough surprises and new ideas to let it sidestep a lot of retro JRPG problems. Random battles are thankfully absent, with enemy encounters taking place at clearly-marked nodes on the overworld map. Enemy groups in dungeons are represented by a character model that moves around and can be avoided if desired. You can’t really bypass combat entirely, but it’s rare to be surprised by a foe you’re not expecting. And defeated encounters disappear from the environment, so you won’t be stuck in an endless stream of combats when you’re trying to solve a puzzle. The only thing i have a problem with in this game, is the world map, i would like to see where i am. 

Battle Chasers: Nightwars’ combat and activity-dense world scratch the JRPG itch, for a while, pitty the game is not longer. Its attractive dungeons and outdoor regions are fun to get lost in, and there are just enough hidden treasures to claim to make exploration rewarding in a more than visual capacity. I’d be very pleased to see more turn-based indie RPGs along the same lines as Nightwar in the future - and the ending heavily suggests this won’t be the last we see of this universe in RPG form. i would giv this game a 9.5 out of 10

35513291.review:
19hrs so far and I'm already losing sleep. I just can't get enough of how beautiful the graphics and the animations are. Looking forward to play more over the weekeend.

There are minor annoyance like the sound effect is louder than the voice sound and some quality of life user interface, for instance, able to equip non-active characters and the ability to switch active characters without needing an Inn.

The drop rate is very generous that it over-shadows the crafting system and not having any crafting table in town makes me not bother with crafting at all. I don't know why decided to put the crafting table in dungeons and explorable area...doesn't make sense.

Other than these, the game plays smoothly and I have not experience any drop in FPS -- the animation is so smooth and it doesn't have any resource issue (e.g. no memory leaks). Good job Airship, this is a very good game (but needs some patches).

画风超棒，看了第一眼就想买的那种；
动作流畅，打击感很舒服；
过载的设计比较新颖；
怪物形象设计得很帅，史莱姆长的就不一般，兽人更帅；
技能太多了，有点眼花缭乱的感觉，作用类似的技能就不应该出现第二个；
最后强烈建议：按M打开地图后，能按esc退出！！能按esc退出！！能按esc退出！！
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
玩了30小时了，游戏难度略高，总体来说，到达一个新地点，怪物的等级一般比我方要高，所以初见难度有点大，但随着游戏进行，我方等级提高，战斗慢慢变简单，建议降低初见怪物等级，越往后怪物也就越高级，这样才有旗鼓相当的对手；
暗影币不要乱花，留来买皮肤啊！最大的感触是莫妮卡的皮肤我TM社保！！
人物走路速度确实有点慢啊，大地图和地下城都是；
开战前和战斗后的动作有点多余有点烦，战斗结算能不能跳得快点。
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
大地图北方的BGM太棒了，有种悲凉宏伟的感觉；
发觉装备设计其实有很大问题，稀有度更高的装备，并没有什么与众不同的特效和属性，往往离不开“攻击时有几率造成某某额外伤害”这些字眼，导致玩家觉得这是换了皮的增加了属性的装备而已，失去了一种获得超牛逼装备时的惊喜的感觉；
哈姆之路右方的井里有动静，据说能够把里面的人救出来，但是为什么我这里没有任何互动选项，谁能告诉我为什么？

35510891.review:
เกมเป็แนว RPG turnbase ลงดัน ตามเนื้อเรื่อง มีตัวละครให้เล่น 6 ตัว ถ้าปลดครบนะ เอาไปได้ทีละ 3 ก็จัดทีมแล้วแต่สไตล์  แต่ละตัวโดดเด่นไม่เหมือนกัน ในดันค่อนข้างสนุก มี puzzle บ้าง ลงดันได้ดรอปหีบสุ่มของ ได้แต้มมาแลกของในเมือง 
 
>ระบบต่อสู้< 
ก็แบบ turnbase ผลัดกันตี skill มีให้ใช้เยอะพอสมควร ดีหลายท่า ไม่ค่อยมีท่าง่อยๆ เท่าไร
จะมีเรื่องเด่นๆ คือ overcharge หรือ เอาง่ายๆก็คือ มานาส่วนเกิน สมมุติ มานาเรามีปกติคือ 100 แต่พอต่อยมอนไปที ได้มานาเพิ่มมา 10 
มันจะไปอยู่ในส่วน overcharge เวลาเราใช้สกิลท่ามันกิน มานา 10 มันก็จะไปกินแค่ในส่วน overcharge แต่ถ้าสกิลมันกิน 20 ก็จะมาลดมานาจริงๆ ของเราอีก 10 พอจบแมทสู้นั้นมานาจาก overcharge ก็จะหายไป ก็ทำให้เราบริหารจัดการมานาในดันได้อีกแบบ เจอมอนโหดหน่อยก็กดมานาจริงเปิดท่าก่อนเลย เจอมอนอ่อนก็ต่อยเอา มานา overcharge ฟรีๆ มาใช้ก่อน  
นอกจากนี้ยังมี เกจ burst เก็บเกจใช้ท่าไม้ตาย ซึ้งของแต่ละตัวก็แตกต่างกันไป มีทั้งบัพ ทั้งทำดาเมจ ก็แล้วแต่
บอสไฟต์ค่อนข้างสนุก ทำออกมาได้ดี บอสสมกับเป็นบอสหน่อย มีท่าโกงๆ ไรงี้ ไม่ใช่มาง่อยๆ แล้วก็ตายไป
เกมเพล์ในดันเจี้ยนก็สนุกดี สดใหม่พอสมควรเลย

>ระบบไอเทม< 
ก็เหมือนเกม rpg ทั่วๆไป ลงดันได้ของ ได้หีบเปิดสุ่มของ ได้แต้มไปแลกของจาก npc ในเมือง หาของคราฟ คราฟออฟยัดไอเทม+สเตตัสต่างๆ ของก็ดรอปตามความยากที่เลือกในดัน  แต่มันเซงตรงการคราฟของ ยัดออฟ ต้องไปหาเครื่องคราฟในดัน ก็งงทำไมไม่เอามาไว้ในเมืองวะ ยุ่งยากเกินไป ต้องไปกดลงดันเดินหามันอีก ดูลำบากแบบไม่จำเป็น

>ระบบตัวละคร<
มีให้อัพ perk สนับสนุน +สเตตัส ความแรงสกิล หรือ เอฟเฟคต่างๆ ตามแต่ตัวละคร สามารถรีทิ้งอัพใหม่ได้ตลอดเวลา มีหนังสือได้แต้มดรอป และให้แลกในเมือง ก็ถ้าฟาร์มรัวๆ แต้ม perk ก็เยอะหน่อย ทำให้เล่นง่ายขึ้น เวลาจะไปดันช่วงเวลถึงใหม่ๆ
ความอิสระในการเลือกคลาสไม่ค่อยเยอะเท่าไร เพราะเกมกำหนด คลาสมาแค่นั้น ก็ต้องเล่นตามที่มี แล้วตัวละครไหนไม่ได้เอาไปเวล ก็ต้องมาเวลมัน บางทีก็เซง น่าจะเวลอัพไปพร้อมๆกันหน่อย ตัวไม่ได้เอาไปก็น่าจะได้เลเวลด้วย ไม่ต้องมาเสียเวลาฟามร์มเวลกันทุกตัว

>ข้อเสีย<
-การจัดการตัวละครไม่ค่อยดีเลย อย่างที่บอกตัวไหนไม่ได้ไปเวลก็ต้องมาเสียเวลาฟาร์มมันด้วย ระบบแลกของก็มีไม่ครบทุกอาชีพตามช่วงเลเวล โดดๆ ข้ามๆ ไงไม่รู้ 
-ระบบ perk น่าจะมีผลต่อตัวละครมากกว่านี้ แบบเปลี่ยนเอฟเฟคของสกิลไปเลย มันจะดูน่าสนใจมากกว่านี้ 
-คลาสที่มีมันอิสระน้อยไป 
-ตัวหุ่นยนต์มันดีเกินไปในการลงดัน ทำให้กลายเป็นตัวที่ต้องมีเอาออกไม่ได้ ถ้าอยากลงดันในระดับยากๆ เลยเหมือนเอาตัวไปได้แค่ 2 เพราะหุ่นของแล้ว 1 ที่
-ระบบคราฟ คราฟอาวุธนี่ไม่จำเป็นเลย หาเอาในดันดีกว่า ส่วนออฟของนี่สำคัญ แต่ต้องไปออฟในดัน เพื่ออะไร ลำบากไปไหม 

SCORE 7.5/10

โดยรวมสนุกมากกกก แต่มีอะไรขัดใจเล็กๆน้อยๆ แบบมันทำได้ดีกว่านี้นะ ทำไมไม่เน้นหน่อยไรงี้ กับคลาสที่ไม่หลากหลายทั้งๆที่มันทำได้
แต่เกมเพล์รวมๆนั้น สนุกโคตรรรรร

35510369.review:
Very enjoyable JRPG.

Driving is a bit wonky w/ the WASD, but it isn't a detraction from the game at all.

The combat is enjoyable and no more repetitive than most JRPGs.  The random elements are likewise not a detraction.  You won't lose a fight due to a bad string of rolls.

The voice act is excellent.  The story and characters are interesting.  The graphics and animations are worth the price of admission by themselves.  If you like JRPGs, this is a must have.  If you like the comics from years past, you will want to get this.  If you're on the fence, check out the gameplay on YouTube by SplatterCatGaming.  It's worth the $30 so far to me.  At this point, I'm already hoping for an added DLC campaign!

35508994.review:
Pros: 
Beautiful Graphics and styling
Great fight animations
Good number of skill sets to use
Dungeon skills are an interesting dynamic
Nice voiceovers and storyline

Cons:
Slow paced
Slightly Grindy
Highly Linear gameplay
Odd crafting system
Heavy level gating
No autobattle


Battle Chasers will take in most RPG players with its great steampunk styling and beautifully rendered graphics and animation work. There is little not to like about the great Diablo/Torchlight style. Dungeons are randomized using individual stylesets that the game chooses from and places accordingly -- so even though its random, players can enjoy the incredible level of work and detail that went into designing each level.

It is worth noting here that the game is not 100% complete yet, so there is likely still a lot of work to be done, but I will delve a bit into my issues with the game as far as gameplay. 

The first thing to note is that this game is SLOW. Walking around the instanced dungeons, or even the world map itself feels like its moving at a snails pace. It may be that I am simply used to faster paced gameplay but, having read the reviews, a lot of players are stating the same thing. The game would do well to speed up map movements, as some of the dungeons can be quite long as it is, and the slow walking speed is a constant source of aggravation. 

Likewise, the game pace is slow in terms of leveling, with the party leveling up once per dungeon instance which can take as long as an hour to complete. However, the leveling speed is intentional by design -- Battle Chasers is a highly linear environment. No matter how much you grind, you'll find that your level will always closely match that of the opponents you're facing in the storyline. The game is designed to penalize players attempting to overlevel by dramatically decreasing the amount of experience earned for enemies that are a lower level than you. This is dissapointing, as you never really feel as though you're progressing or becoming more powerful during gameplay, as there is no incentive to fight enemies lower level than your own. 

Adding insult to injury, all character weapons and equipment in the game are heavily gated with level requirements. Essentially this translates into very restricted gameplay -- not only can you rarely outlevel your opponents, but even if you find that ultra rare weapon, it will either be specifically for your character level (meaning its not overpowered) or you won't be able to equip it until much later in the game....basically when it won't be as cool a find. 

When it comes to equipment in general, there are a few ways you can obtain it. You can purchase it from vendors, find it in battles or in chests, or craft it yourself. The crafting system in the game is not something I've really dived into, owing to its complexity. As far as I know from my admittedly limited time playing the game, you may only craft items at specific workbenches that you'll find in dungeon crawls. Unfortunately I think this really plays against any crafting system. Dungeons are for looting and leveling, not for crafting equipment, and this gameplay mechanic seems very out of place.

More importantly, I felt that crafting in the game was entirely too complicated and ultimately a waste of time. In order to craft equipment, you must first purchase the various crafting books to teach you recipes. The crafting books themselves cost several hundred gold a piece, whereas the equipment that you'd be crafting is readily available for purchase at the vendors for just a few hundred more. Crafting is also gated behind the leveling system, meaning you won't be able to craft high level items until your character level matches (though even if you could, you still wouldnt be able to equip them)

Possibly the worst aspect of the game is that even though its obvious the developers spent a lot of time regulating leveling and equipment to maintain game balance, there were still a lot of instances where it felt very off. I could be going through a dungeon decimating all enemies in my path without even using skills, only to die unmercifully to the end stage boss. Part of the reason for this is due to the games heavy reliance on DOT mechanics, which can add up to several hundred damage per turn. This wouldn't be so bad if your characters could inflict a similar level of DoT damage on enemies, but it is actually paltry in comparison. Likewise, its difficult to tell how much damage your character will take from any of the many DoT effects, making it hard to properly prepare for in battle. 

The game is good, but needs some work to really shine, especially in the gating and crafting areas.

35505806.review:
Battle Chasers: Nightwar (based on the popular comic books) is a turn-based RPG with a big focus on exploration.

While some developers spend their Kickstarter money on strippers and booze, Airship Syndicate choose to invest theirs into making the best game possible, and they delivered. 

The world is beautiful and interesting to explore, the visuals really makes the game pop and without doubt, this is one of the best looking games I've played this year.

The combat may get a bit repetitive after a while, but it's still a handful of fun to plan out your moves, and you get that sweet satisfying feeling after you bring down an enemy.

Well done Airship Syndicate!

35503353.review:
[h1][b]An RPG where the little girl in your party is the Tank while the Colossal Wargolem is the healer[/b] -Character Design 10/10[/h1]

[i](Scroll Down to the end if details bore you)[/i]

[h1]COMBAT[/h1] 

The turnbased combat is very reminiscent to Final Fantasy games while introducing it's own unique mechanics such as  "Overcharge" 

Overcharge is basically temporary mana a character is given whenever they do regular actions in combat. It's a mechanic that encourages activity over inactivity, the first I've seen in a turnbased game and probably one of my favorites.

[b][i]#MakeTurnbasedGreatAgain[/i][/b]

[h1]TORCHLIGHT + KINGDOM HEARTS: CHAIN OF MEMORIES DUNGEON CRAWLING [/h1]

Exploration in Battle Chasers: NW shares similarities with [b]Torchlight[/b] (for its level designs) and [b]Kingdom Hearts: Chain of Memories[/b] (for the dungeon layout & enemy encounters). Also, the layout of the dungeons changes whenever you revisit them, this gives a non linear grinding/farming experience.

[h1]STORY / WRITING [/h1]

The main plot is not that spectacular, but the rest of the writing itself is excellent in my opinion, the characters outside of the main cutscenes are endearing and the bits of lore found all across the world are all the more intriguing. But behind the dark undertones, what I enjoy most are the subtle jokes the writers slip in from time to time...

One time when I was fishing, the game told me I caught a fish that legends say could talk, but since I hooked it out of the water, it died and I can never test the theory anymore. 

[h1]VISUALS[/h1]

The 2D and 3D aesthetics of this game blends together so well.
The UI, the animations, the 3D models and environments, every visual aspect of the game shares the same artistic motif, it's very consistent and enjoyable to look at for hours and hours of gameplay.

And with Joe Madureira himself behind the creative direction is just icing on the cake.

I'm a bit biased on this one cuz I'm a real sucker for comic book artstyles, specially for Joe Mad's art. If you are too, you would probably enjoy the visuals as much I did.


----------------------------------- SUMMARY -----------------------------------

VISUALS: Epic. 
COMBAT: Final Fantasy w/ It's own unique mechanics.
DUNGEON CRAWLING: Torchlight + Kingdom Hearts: Chain of Memories
NARRATIVE: Meh Story, Endearing Characters, Great Lore, Funny but can be dark at times.
BUGS/GLITCHES: No game breaking ones

35502710.review:
Nach 5 Jahren mein erstes Review auf Steam. Warum jetzt? Weil ich jedem dieses Spiel sehr ans Herz legen will!!! Wer Final Fantasy liebt und rundenbasierte Kämpfe mag, für den ist dies genau das Richtige. Es macht viel Spaß und bietet sehr viel Abwechslung. Alleine deswegen, da es sich lohnt Dungeons nochmal zu besuchen und einfach an deren Schwierigkeit zu schrauben. Die Kämpfe wirken grandios und lebendig. Die Charakterentwicklung ist recht simpel, (Keine Charakterpunkte bei lvlUP) denn die mit dem Level UP erworbenen "Talentbaumpunkte" kann man nutzen um bestimmte Bonis zu aktivieren, um einen Charakter in jeweils 2 für ihn mögliche Bahnen zu lenken (Z.b. Tank / Schaden) Gefällt einem dies nicht mehr kann man seine Punkte zurück ziehen und neu verteilen. Auch wenn es simpel ist, bietet das gute Möglichkeiten den Wunschhelden zu formen.

Fazit: Ein episches Rollenspiel, welches viel Spaß und Abwechslung bietet sowohl für alte Hasen, als auch für Einsteiger ins Rollenspiel Genre. Das lebendige Kampssystem und die vielen Quests / Wiederholbaren Dungeons fesseln gerne lange Zeit ohne das der Spielspaß je zu kurz kommt!!!

35499885.review:
已经很久没有玩到这么老派正统的RPG游戏了，而且还是西方制作组做的日式RPG。片头动画甚至让我想到了幻想/宿命/永恒传说。
原著是90年代连载的同名美漫，画了大概9期之后坑了。作者进入游戏圈做了很多你们熟悉的游戏，比如暗黑血统。
所以这游戏从视觉上看和暗黑血统非常非常像。游戏很好的还原了漫画的设定并且把一些不太好看的地方改良了，比如机器人的胸。

---------各个方面具体如何---------

画面：基本上无可挑剔，除非你不喜欢这种画风，不然怎么都给不出差评。不过大地图的画风和游戏整体有点脱节，变成了类似饥荒那样的笔触。
音乐：整体来说中等偏上，但BOSS战的音乐非常好。
游戏性：基本上是日式RPG的改良版。虽然是按照速度顺序“你打一下，我打一下”但由于技能的释放有快慢，先放哪个再放哪个非常有讲究，如果技能搭配得当甚至可以让己方完成“MT嘲讽+全队BUFF+给对面DEBUFF”一套标准流程之后才轮到敌方第一次行动。
过载槽是个不错的系统，有的职业靠这续航，有的职业靠这飙DPS，用不好的话游戏难度会高很多。
剧情：主线推进速度稍慢，剧情好坏还不清楚。不过这游戏我不是很在乎剧情，也许漫画原著党会很在意吧。
语言：包括中文的11国语言+包括日语的7国配音，还有什么不满足的？除非你是中文配音辣耳朵爱好者。你甚至能用俄语配音玩出奇怪的感觉。但选了中文之后有个问题。DEBUFF和BUFF剩余几个回合的数字会显示不出来，英文版就没这个问题，对于战术安排来说还是挺重要的，希望能改正。

---------到底要不要买？---------

如果你喜欢这种画风：必买
漫画原著党：必买
传统日式RPG爱好者并且对美漫画风不排斥：必买
喜欢战斗节奏自己掌握，打完一回合思考半天再进行下一步的人：买

35499762.review:
*본인은 이 게임을 토먼트를 얻기 위해 구매한 모 사이트 랜덤박스에서 얻기 전 까지 , 이 게임에 대해 몰랐던 상태.
*조사해보니 90년대 후반 배틀 체이서의 스핀 오프이며 , 젤다 , 파판시리즈등의 영향을 받았다고함.

솔직히 이 게임에 대한 첫 인상은 랜덤박스에서 꽝 나왔네 라는 기분이 강했다. THQ 노르딕의 배급 작품은 딥실버 급은 아니지만 전체적으로 부실한 편이었고 , 최근 디비니티2가 다시 명성을 회복시켜주었긴 하지만 전체적인 불신도가 높은 킥스타터 제작이기 때문.
실제로 플레이를 해보니 전체적으로는 '몇몇 단점은 있지만 수작'  정도로 볼 수 있을듯.


1. 비쥬얼 , 사운드

이 게임에서 단점이 없는 부분. 만화 같은 그래픽과 여러 아트 디자인들은 상당히 뛰어남. 이런 만화 스타일의 그래픽과 분위기를 좋아한다면 취향 저격. 사운드도 엄청 뛰어난데 게임의 비쥬얼과 상황에 맞는 좋은 사운드트랙으로 구성되어 있다.
특정 언어 기준으로 성우 연기가 부족하다는 평가가 있긴 하지만 영어 음성 기준으로는 전체적으로 성우 연기는 딱히 문제가 있지 않음.  문제가 있다면 좀 하자 있는 스토리텔링에서 오는 루즈함 때문이 클듯.


2. 전투

기본적으로 구 파판시리즈와 같이 전투 전 필드에서부터 기습 , 기절등의 방법을 사용 가능하고 ,  실제 전투에 들어가면 오리지날 턴제 방식으로 진행. 생각보다 스킬도 다양하고 , 생각외로 타격감도 상당하다. 기본적인 전술로는 필드에서의 치유가 제한적이기에 전투에서 최대한 치유를 하는 방식이 있다. 또한 기본적인 행동으로 차오르는 과충전이라는 마나 시스템은 상당히 좋은 편.
다만 전체적인 난이도 상승 곡선이 지멋대로라 이러한 잘만든 전투 시스템을 망치는 큰 옥의 티가 있긴 함.


3. 게임 디자인

아까 상술 했듯이 , 스토리텔링에 하자가 좀 있는 편이라 스토리를 중시하는 클래식 RPG파라면 불만스러울 것임.
전체적으로 이 게임은 파밍 , 제작  , 마법부여등 많은 시스템이 있으며 이러한 시스템때문에 파밍이 게임의 중요 요소가 됨. 
예를 들면 던전에 들어가서 각종 전리품을 파밍하고 , 이러한 전리품으로 새로운 장비를 제작하거나 강화를 하며 던전의 난이도에 따라 전리품의 가치도 달라지는 전형적인 던전 크롤러 요소가 강한 게임. 

이 부분의 단점이라면 흔히 말하는 폐지수집류에 대한 지루함을 느끼는 사람들에게는 이 요소에 강조를 둔 부분이 많아 질릴수도 있음.

If you're new you may wonder who these people are since there is no introduction at all. The game is presented as part of their regular adventures. So on that note you may be a bit disappointed.

35492693.review:
集大成的美漫日式RPG。火炬之光的蒸汽朋克画风，最终幻想3式的地图和回合制战斗系统，英雄联盟式的天赋系统，地下城与勇士式的地下城系统，令人惊喜的打击感，多处小彩蛋，这款游戏虽然不见得有多神，但是肯定是目前为止在我心里各项综合最为优秀的游戏。
在此之前我觉得神作的是NDS重制的最终幻想3和勇者斗恶龙9星空守护者。

35491296.review:
优点：精良的画面，主要剧情有配音，美式漫画的过场。6个英雄，一个英雄2套随意切换的天赋树，5个装备位，武器和护甲能附魔，让角色养成搭配有很大的自由，刷刷刷爱好者也可以找到很大的乐趣。
缺点：地城节奏稍慢，主要体验在刷一个本可能要一个多小时，次要谜题很多很隐晦，谜题没有记录，收益也一般，可能有时候还没翻个箱子高，角色地城技能不平衡，地城Q技能非常难瞄准。地城难度不会随角色提升。

35491281.review:
全成就达成，撒花๑乛◡乛๑已经没什么值得害怕的了！
（这么久才完成主要是该死的BUG，海盗船长刷不出来，直到这次更新修复了我才完成）
（存档放到群里了，有需要的朋友可以到群里下载或者直接百度云，676160176战神夜袭交流群，欢迎萌新大佬讨论游戏！RUA！）
（https://pan.baidu.com/s/1gfkuQ47）
一直想着刷完这个英雄本就睡觉，然后就天亮了QAQ。
0：过载相当于临时法力，想玩得舒服些，就要在过载上做文章[spoiler]（白嫖的艺术）[/spoiler]。
0.5：格莉的护盾可以叠加[spoiler]（护甲都是纸系列）[/spoiler]。
1：击杀BOSS获得的碎片和完成挑战可以获得暗影石，在收藏家处兑换皮肤和强力装备[spoiler]（TX：皮肤代表了战斗力）[/spoiler]。
1.5：天赋分为两项，进攻和防守，如格莉分复仇者和守护[spoiler]（我到12级才知道）[/spoiler]。
1.6：格莉适合点守护，嘲讽叠盾做主T（利用嘲讽加的过载，免费叠盾）。
1.7：机器人可点自然，续航治疗的辅助，也可以点炮击，破甲野火疯狂输出。其实机器人最适合堆攻击，因为无论输出还是治疗都得靠攻击力QAQ。留一只怪让机器人加满血的战术行不通（至少效率不高），敌人打得贼痛，机器人奶得贼少。
1.8：盖伦主点E副Q.....咳，加里森点剑术，老老实实拿[spoiler]黑暗[/spoiler]剑砍人就行了，由于普攻过载加的多，可以随便用技能，平砍+15过载就可以免费接剑意，输出爆表。
1.9：人物的爆发技能要善用，个人觉得机器人的群体回血清BUFF很棒[spoiler]（但爆发的动画演出很烦）[/spoiler]。
2：游戏隐藏元素较多，副本中的隐藏宝箱需要细心探索，如砸开发光的墙，进入瀑布等方式。
2.5：进副本的时候，建议尽量选最高难度（也不难），目前BOSS都是一次过（目前）。
3：副本结束后进入大地图在附近转转，会看到一个游荡的飞艇，上面的精英怪非常强！。
4：烽火洞那里需要将全部火把都点亮，打火焰领主每回合机器人清好BUFF就很简单了，打败火焰领主后可以使用右方的工作台。烈焰领主的余烬可以无限次数点燃火把。
4.5：下水道的美....嗯..史莱姆比较猛，团灭了一次还没打过。
4.6：强迫症玩家，所以进度比较慢，没有追求速通，玩得比较细致。毕竟难得遇到一款这么棒的回合制RPG，不想囫囵吞枣匆匆结束，好好地享受它才是正确的选择。
5：前期衣服最好全都附魔回春，稳定的回血可以让你在副本途中轻松很多（兽牙小径生命之泉处附魔）。
附魔回春前：玩家巨大劣势！玩家面如死灰！玩家阵型很差！玩家且战且退！玩家进退维谷！玩家无路可逃！
附魔回春后：输不了！无限续航你告诉我怎么输！不可能输的！平A过去就稳赢了!
(好像哪里不对，这前后两句话不是一样意思吗)
6：:队伍里换人可以在酒馆换，进副本之前也可以按=换人。
7：爆发3需要达成一点条件，格莉可以直接学，剑士需要竞技场600分，盗贼需要杀死兽人投弹手，机器人需要杀死狩猎任务的上古机器人，法师需要完成附魔师的任务（收集3个传记，最后一个在戌塞），阿鲁门需要打败南部部荒野的肆虐灵魂（头骨需要在死亡哨站获得）。
8：遇到棘手的战斗尽量在战斗之前使用地下城技能获得增益（或对敌人减益）。
9：狩猎任务的井在南大门那里，也就是放置死者之心的那个。乞丐乱炖在酒馆可以买，旧货镇炖菜和粗制烈酒在惊爆酒吧酒保处可以买，梯子的话旧货镇副本当中获得，根据他们所说的，最后一个步骤需要1W，即便不够钱也能下去。。
10：打造武器可以通过添加材料让成功率达到300%，打造出来的是紫色品质。
11：守墓人狩猎任务需要到南部荒野的赤色墓穴挖坟，捏碎符文石之后可以获得钥匙，使用之后打败守墓人即可。
12：破灭二重奏的狩猎任务，需要一些材料打造核心来启动惊爆酒吧2楼的机器人，其中的注魔深渊铁锭需要在急跃之地采掘场下面的矿工处换取，换取之前需要在死亡哨站副本里换取过矿石（补充一下，那是一个类似石碑的互动点，可以兑换4次），一共4个，然后对话矿工会把注魔打造书给你，而苏西之核则是在旧货镇副本里的机器人处获得。
13：荒野下方有一个无主沉船的探索区域，在取得乐谱之后可以到钢琴处演奏，可以获得宝箱。把3个乐章合奏之后可以引出一只BOSS（很强！）
13.5：上古兵器狩猎任务在荒野大地图的另一个探索点，打败上古机器人便可完成任务并且解锁机器人的爆发3。
13.6：戌塞有可以升级装备品质的魔方，剑元素可以掉落染血卷轴，可以打造剑士25级紫武赤色黎明。
14：说一点小技巧，在打狩猎BOSS或者竞技场之前，可以到大地图各处逛一圈，获取数个神殿祝福BUFF（BUFF为对战场次，而不是回合数，所以竞技场可以一直有效）。
14.2：天赋有地下城大师这样一个技能，可以让地下城技能次数翻倍，在酒馆休息之前可以点出，休息之后再重新洗点可以保留次数。
14.5：说一下本人队伍配置，新手三巨头，最大化输出方式是战士开爆发2，全体加60%暴击，然后战士用狂暴，额外4下一般都能打全，附上天赋暴击出血，机器人开野火，附上天赋野火破甲，神秘商人处换取的破甲饰品（50%易伤），机器人速度快，破了甲才轮到战士输出，输出可最大化。女拳老实嘲讽开披风免秒杀就行。
15：下面附上一个3DM论坛的全神器攻略（纯搬运,感谢诸位大佬）---
冬脉地图右上，深红花园左边，苍白教堂，左右各3本书，拿齐6把神器的线索
阿格里斯的圣盾 
阿格里斯的废弃之盾：按照线索，围城海岸和哈姆之路中间，巴诺格洞窟，拿到死亡之心后，在里面一个台子上使用可以开启一条新的路，里面的箱子里面就是
邪血精华：狩猎任务渴血者。苍白教堂中间有个血池，就是开始任务的地方。
要求填满的鲜血容器，在深红花园随机刷新的一个场景中会有鲜血之泉，不是摸3次给饰品的那个，是在一个需要开关打开的门里面，样子就是喷泉的样子，交互会提示。
远古吸血鬼之牙，深红花园、法力裂缝、冬脉大地图的吸血鬼怪物掉落。
诅咒之刃  
被亵渎的猛者灵魂碎片：竞技场最高级通关 
被遗忘的勇者灵魂碎片：狩猎任务地下的声音。梯子就在地下城旧货镇。这个图里有可以进去的小屋，我在第一个可以进去的小屋里面找到了梯子。同时这个屋子里面还有传送点。
灾祸 
巨兽大炮废料：地图上有一个到处乱跑的飞艇，遇见进入战斗后要有一只“巨兽”的怪才掉.
双生核心： 来自狩猎任务破灭二重奏。
狂野元素碎片在戍塞的亵渎者巴格斯掉落
苏西之核在旧货镇地下城中可以得到。
龙族
龙心遗物：法力裂缝地下城里面拿充能水晶碎片，大地图上有一个需要5个碎片的箱子（大地图法力裂缝的正上方，不清楚随机否）
龙鳞： 刷钢铁前哨，随机出现的一个场景中，该场景会出现一个地下城门口出现过的石像，“守护者守护着钢铁前哨，警告一切想要进去的人：在该场景找到一口石棺，放出一个灵魂（亲测，直接放了就行），接着去死亡哨站刷刷刷，直到出现随机刷新出那张有贝弗列斯之墓的场景，场景会一个墓穴，进去墓穴后只有一个死者之心的台子，对话（交互），台子后出现一条路，那就是贝弗列斯之墓（进入贝弗列斯之墓后左边有一个可以破坏的石墙，里面有个不在地图上标识的大箱子），之前刷新这个场景的时候，因为没有在钢铁前哨放出贝弗列斯，并没有贝弗列斯，现在有了，打败后可得.
命运/毁灭
冬脉北部闪现站右边一个迷宫里面，规定时间内踩完3个石板可得一张藏宝图，跟着藏宝图找就好了，最后一个线索答案是在惊爆点酒吧的地图里面有一个鱼点，到鱼点附近会有提示。
活体石板：石像鬼的怪物掉落。深红花园、法力裂缝、冬脉大地图的石像鬼怪物掉落
诸神黄昏
元素核心：法力裂缝和冬脉大地图元素怪掉落
邪恶遗物：法力裂缝和冬脉大地图上古巫妖掉落
修好的凯灵顿手杖：狩猎任务，墓园守护者；狩猎任务，绅士
死亡哨站大地图上面的赤色墓穴中挖开所有的墓地都，之后可以和墓穴守护者的战斗，然后一个墓穴里，可以找到漂亮的手杖。
围城海岸左上方的惊爆点酒吧用礼帽（神秘商人换的）一楼上二楼的位置，找人换成大帽子
苍白教堂右边书架上的机关，开门后的宝箱里取得眨眼指环，然后哈姆之路北门出去左拐，竞技场正上方的废弃驿站，进去左边用眨眼指环开门拿精致的单片眼镜 
拿齐后回到赤色墓穴，在凯灵顿的墓碑前放上去，开打。
16：成就方面基本已经完成了，有一个隐藏成就叫 NO Parley的，完成方法是杀死15-20个飞船，就可以遇到海盗船长，打败即可。图鉴有啥找不到的也可以问我。
17：目前刚进入2周目，继承技能天赋爆发传记图鉴，道具继承邪恶单片眼镜（副本提示），副本开启神话难度，装备整体开启橙色品质。因为有天赋的存在，比一周目还要轻松。
18：图鉴第9页第11个是琪丝瓦拉，一只蜘蛛，在兽牙小径有一个场景，3个火把围着一本日记，日记可以阅读二，四，七部分，从中得知可以从敌人害怕光亮，于是熄灭3个火把，蜘蛛来袭。

35491237.review:
LV10までプレイしました。

"もっさり”している。この一言に尽きるゲームです。

フィールド移動は反応が遅くノロノロした感じがつきまといます。
インターフェイス自体もパッドがなければ非常に面倒で、そのパッド操作も直感性にかけてなおかつカーソルの移動ももっさりです。（マウス片手でのんびり出来るゲームではありません）
戦闘はスピード感がないためイライラしますし、魔法（？）のエフェクトも大袈裟で時間ばかりかかり、そのためカーソル移動のない攻撃連打になりがちです。（これですら遅いですが）
グラフィックや戦闘システムアイテム作成など、面白そうな部分も見られますが、もっさりなところが全てを台無しにしています。
torchilightの会社と聞いて楽しみにしてましたが、出来が悪すぎです。

ただ値段も安いですし、セールも期待できそうなので日本のコンシューマーのRPGが好きな人ならこのスピード感でも楽しめる気はします。
洋ゲーに慣れた方にはつらいゲームだと思います。

戦闘のバランス、緊張感など楽しい部分もあるのになぁ。残念

35490150.review:
10/4购买，刚玩到第二个地下城兽牙小径，简单做下评测：
画面：动画渲染的游戏画面非常精致，甚至可以说非常的漂亮。地下城的环境也是和主题息息相关，制作组的细心程度可见一斑。
系统：传统日式回合制RPG的战斗模式虽然听上去简单，但是制作组在系统上是下了不少功夫的，丰富的普攻技能和消耗技能、随时可改的天赋系统都让战斗充满乐趣。当然传统的锻造、怪物图鉴什么的也都该有的都有，毫无遗漏。系统上暂时让我感觉不足的在于装备系统，纸人模式的装备系统在造型上变化不多，一些装备甚至都一个样子，比较让人缺乏配装的兴趣，不知道打到后期是否会有变化。
声音：音乐、音效个人认为不过不失。好听，但是缺少变化，特别是战斗音乐听多了的确有些无趣。
语言：有中文的确对玩家的帮助非常大，毕竟RPG，英语不好的玩起来肯定会比较困难，但是有必要指出的是翻译的质量有待加强，错别字、字体问题有不少，虽然不影响理解，但总觉得有些拉低游戏评分。
最后，游戏是非常非常非常推荐的，对日式回合制RPG有兴趣的都可以入手玩一玩，挺有乐趣的。

35490133.review:
9/10

Darksiders had a child, with Final Fantasy and Heroes of Might and Magic. :D
I adore Joe Madureira's work. So maybe I am biased.

The art, the animation, the gameplay is all quality work. I can't describe, how much.
Maybe the story will leave a little empty feeling in you, but it is enjoyable so far I played. I realy missed at least a little prologue quest to know the characters a bit better and why they end up in the situation, they are in the beginning. 
As for the gameplay, the turn-based combat is realy enjoyable. The moving through the worldmap is easy and makes me remember Heroes of Might and Magic.  

I was too little to read the original Battle Chasers comic, but this game made me interested. I want to know the story of Gully and the others a bit better.
Maybe make some DLC or patches, so we can experience more about the story please?

This is just a quick review to recommend the game.  I will update once I have completed the game.  So far, so good.  I'm very pleased with the game after 16 hours with my only criticism being that it is a bit grindy, but I do indeed love grindy games.  I really like saving up mats and money to upgrade and imporve gear.  I have skipped every single video and chat bubble, that is not a diss on the game, but a personal thing.. time is money boys.  I hope to 100% the achievs and I think that is possible with enough playtime invested.  There is a clear path of progression, but I like to redo most of the dungeons on legendary.  I can easily watch the world burn on the news while I play this game in my peripheral vision.  It is very satisfying soldiering on through this game.

***103 hours...and its finally over and 100% done.. great game, must buy.. thanks devs for the fun.. also, for the love of God please do not add any more achievements... I don't think I can handle much more!***

35482941.review:
Absolutely beautiful game with really "meaty" combat animations! Surprisingly intreresting combat once you get past level 6 or so. At first it felt like it was "just" a stunning game with little depth and standard JRPG turn based combat, but after a while you realize that they have taken the design beyond that and iterated on it. There are plenty of interesting synergies between your characters, and I really like the mana-managment. Another thing that lifts the combat encounters: Enemies are smart enough to be a challenge, and have a variety of attacks to throw at you, especially if you do dungeons on higher difficulties. 

I only had one instane where I had to restart the game, I managed to trigger a dialogue at the same time as a combat encounter and could therefore proceed with neither, but the autosave got me back to the same place in less than a minute so no big deal. 

Thank you Airship Syndicate, it's great to finaly play the game I backed on kickstarter so long ago. You should be really proud of what you've acomplished!

35479361.review:
Battle Chasers: Nightwar ist besser als gedacht. Das Spiel überzeugt mit deutscher Vertonung, einer schön gestallteten Grafikumgebung und das Item System lässt sich sehen. 

Im Spiel läuft ihr auf einer Map herum und killt a la Final Fantasy random Mops. Hier und da gibt es ein Dungeon in 3 Schwierigkeitsgraden und auch eine Arena mit Marken für den Epic scheiss wurde entdeckt. Die Karakter haben jeweils zwei Seiten mit Talenten welche man auswählen kann. Die Fähigkeiten schalten sich mit dem Level frei. Es ist möglich verschiedene Karakter Builds zu spielen da die Fähigkeiten dies zulassen. 

Die Kämpfe dürften noch etwas schneller ablaufen, sonst gibt es bisher nichts zu bemängeln.

Preis / Leistung bisher hervorragend.

35479287.review:
JRPG style Roleplaying done with a very western comic book flair, and done very well.

I was amazed that this game could carry over the comic book aesthetic of it's source material into a video game so well.  While I admittedly knew nothing of the comics before playing, this game made me want to go out and read them and learn more about the vibrant characters and world that the game is set in.  Further, while no knowledge is needed from the comics to enjoy the game, I'm told that the two are set at different times so there's also no need to worry about spoilers, which is nice.

The gameplay is smooth and the combats are handled well, with only a few hiccups when it comes to the power curve in the game.  One of the truly interesting things is how the characters and their powers play off each other.  What one person might consider 'the best group' may be someone elses worst.  Or may not even be good in certain situations.  It encourages exploration of the roles.  Unfortunately this brings to light the biggest flaw in the game.  Each character earns exp individually and independantly.  Don't use a guy for a dungeon or two?  Have fun grinding to get his exp up to everyone else's level.  Trust me, this also offsets the other problem in the game.  One or two levels makes a huge difference.  Especially as the gear is often 'teired' every 3 levels or so.  Going into a dungeon where you're a level below, and your gear is maybe 4-6 levels below is just not going to work out very well for you.  But this can be fixed with grinding and is really the only major downside to the game in my opinion.  The music is top notch as are the sound effects and the voice acting.  Overall, as a fan of RPG games I highly reccomend this one.

Pros:
- beautiful game on every level
- solid game play and combat
- interesting characters / story
- deep game play through
- interesting crafting system that feels optional but powerful
- lots of little secrets to increase replayability of dungeons


Cons:
- Party doesn't share EXP, leading to VAST gulfs in experience levels
- Can be very grindy to get characters to the required power for next dungeon
- Resources (gold, crafting, loot, etc) feels very sparse, which again can lead to grindyness


I highly suggest this game is worth your money if you like RPGs and don't mind a bit of a grind at times through already cleared content.  You won't regret it.

I could make a long winded review, but the simple fact is, is that this game is a classic example of a sleeper hit.

Its not perfect, the combat system is fairly simplistic and the fights can feel a little bit repetitive after a while.. 
But omg the artwork, its something else imho.. i've never been a graphics hohoho, but yeh it looks really good and cute at the same time.
A high level of detail for animations in fights, but also the character models.

The sound both ambient and music, downright beautiful and fits very well with whatever is going on.
It can go as far as creating echo's in the voiceovers if there happens to be a conversation in a cave like environment. 
Note : not every conversation has voiceover mind you, but the "scripted" conversations do.

This game is a gem and well worth the money.. personally i cant believe i've never even heard of this game before.
Devs are still working, reading the comments and acting on it, so thats a plus aswell.

A solid 8 out of 10, could be a solid 9 out of 10 if some of the gripes in the community gets solved. (think keybinding - vibration settings for controllers and minor things like that)

Tolles Spiel, ich kenne zwar die Comics nicht aber nach dem Spiel werde ich mir diese auf jeden Fall mal anschauen, denn das Spiel ist sehr gut, die kämpfe werden immer anspruchsvoller und sind dank der tollen Animationen hübsch anzusehen, die Welt ist sehr hübsch gezeichnet und die Charaktere sind sehr unterschiedlich und interessant gestaltet.

Die Story auch wenn einige der Meinung sind sie sei eine typische 0815 Story, finde ich dennoch gar nicht mal so schlecht und man ist gespannt darauf wie sie weiter geht.


 [h1] Pro [/h1] 

+tolle Animationen
+coole Charaktere 
+schöne, gezeichnete Spielwelt
+vielschichtiges Kampfsystem
+vertone Dialoge


 [h1] Contra [/h1] 

-total nerviges und langweilliges Angelminispiel
-matschige Texturen 
-lineare Weltkarte und Gebiete
-leider sind nicht alle Dialoge vertont
-NG+ ist totaler Mist, man verliert all seinen Fortschritt (Items, Charakter Level, Tränke, Crafting Material usw. alles weg) 

Der NG+ zerstört vollkommen den WIederspielwert, den der NG+ ist nichts anderes als ein neues Spiel nur in einen schwereren Schwiriegkeitsgrad, den man verliert nahezu seinen kompletten Spielfortschritt, das einzige was man behält sind die freigeschaltenen Fähigkeiten und die Vorteilspunkte, wer hier ein NG+ wie in Dark Souls erwartet wird wie ich und viele anderen Spieler sehr entäuscht werden.


Top Spiel das jeder mal gespielt haben sollte.

35471075.review:
[b][i]Battle Chasers: Nightwar[/i] is a solid and welcome addition to the JRPG genre.[/b] They got it right. The world is beautiful, and the story is worthwhile. The combat animations are some of the best I've seen, and the hits carry weight. There are tons of unlockables and progression feels good. You can choose the difficulty level of the dungeons and alter the payout. Yes, that's been done before but it works well here. [b]Also, the fishing is fun![/b]

[i]Essentially, to me, this is a modernized version of the good old [/i]Final Fantasy[i] games from long ago.[/i] The core exploration and fantasy story is there, along with a slew of modern bells-and-whistles such as the unlockables. While this is probably the most AAA game I've played this year, it doesn't feel too gross in that department. But yeah, there is a ton of polish. The sound effects and music are great, and the world is just so *beautiful*.

Most people that read my reviews are into indie games at indie prices. [b]Is this worth the high-ish asking price? Yeah, it is.[/b]

[b]Pros:[/b]
+The artwork is obviously stunning with animations to match
+I'm not a story kind of guy, but this is delightful
+Everything feels balanced so far, progression is satisfying 
+Lots of cool unlockables
+The crafting system is fantastic!
+The fishing is fun for sure
+Great game to play from the couch
+The characters have depth and I'm interested in them

[b]Cons:[/b]
-Why is there no option to speed up battle animations? I'm not complaining just yet, but after a dozen hours I would think people would want that
-Yes, the overworld map is open like a sandbox, but progression is still kind of linear; this was true of the older JRPGs as well, but it's all about how you hide that

[b]If you are in the mood for a great modern JRPG - then [i]Battle Chasers: Nightwar[/i] is what you are looking for.[/b] Totally worth full price.

35468180.review:
Well, it's all i hoped for and more.
I was a kickstarter backer for this game and the developers were amazing at keeping it's backers up to date every step of the way. even if they came across a speed bump, they communicated to their supporters.
so i got the Beta, and started playing a very slightly broken version of the game, and you know what, i loved it so much i didnt even care that some of the features were busted. they released 2 updates during the beta in repsonse to player feedback. what F*&king legends.
Pros:
- great in depth, yet simple combat. (i know that doesnt make a lot of sense, but it's true)
- great art style and animations
- in depth story telling that helps you to care about the characters and makes you want to explore more of the game
- levelling seems fairly balanced and good opportunites to grind, if thats what you want to do. (this is sign of a good rpg, you can grind if you want, but you dont have to if you dont want to.)
- good, in-depth character customisation via perks and equipment, but simple enough that it doesnt leave you cofused.

Cons:
- honestly, i cant really think of any, but im a sucker for this style of rpg/turn-based combat and they've put a lot of thought in to balance and flow in regards to game progression. its hits all the sweet spots in my opinion. but, i realise that  its not everyone's cup of tea.

dont go in to this game with the expectation to compare it to your favourites, go in with an open mind to enjoy a game that does chracters, story telling, combat and exploration in a well thought out and polished way.

thanks Airship Syndicate for allowing me to have a great experience with this game so far, i dont regreat backing you in kickstarter at all.

keep up the great communication skills and you'll have yourself a fan favourite.

35467215.review:
这个游戏非常棒。
首先，我并不是RPG的热衷玩家，职能算是一般喜欢。
然后，这个游戏我是现在3DM发现的，于是尝试了一下。
接着，我在steam入库一发。
·
比起很多上手就觉得老套的RPG，这个游戏有很多心意。
过载系统，天赋，共享大招，这游戏变得更有趣。
而且，片头动画也是非常棒，一下子就让人感受到了诚意。
并且，回合制并不是无聊的“自动攻击”，想要获得更高的效率、输出收益，你得想法利用好“过载”机制。
·
而且，没有矫情的妹子，没有华丽卖肉的衣着，没有莫名其妙的修仙，也没有面瘫小鲜肉，
没有“次时代的引擎”，“真实的物理特效”等等噱头~~
但是却非常的有趣~~~
可以说，这个“回合制RPG”，让我重新认识了“回合制的乐趣”
·
所以，我给他一个赞，更不说自带简中，和不贵的价格。
最后，想给某些抱着老IP啃的大仙一句话——会什么别人的回合制就这么好玩？？少搞噱头，多动脑子想想怎么做游戏。

35465715.review:
일단 게임 자체는 아케이드 게임이구요. 근데 시스템이 상당히 괜찮습니다. 

레벨은 최대 20 후반이 최고레벨일듯 보이는데 여타 디아블로 처럼 파밍이이 가능하며 인챈트 ㅅ시스템에 물약제조 있을건 다 있습니다. 그리고 케릭터는 케릭마다 2가지 특성으로 변경이 가능한데 퍽 시스템같이 있어서 그 특성을 찍었다가 다시 제거 해서 다시 끼는게 가능해 사실상 한가지 특성으로 키우던지 아니면 2가지 특성을 혼합해서 해본다던지 여러가지 실험을 할수 있습니다. 

맵 자체는 역시 아케이드다 보니 작은 감이 있지만 그걸 커버하는게 위에 말한 시스템과 던전이 랜덤 던전으로 계속 플레이를 할수가 있습니다. 던전 보상도 난이도가 높아질수로 좀더 좋은 보상을 줍니다.그리고 몬스터의 경우 도감을 채우고 또 해당 몬스터를 많이 잡아서 영웅들의 능력치 상승도 가능합니다.예를 들어 슬라임 50마리 처치시 영웅 공격력 1% 상승 같은 계속해서 몬스터를 잡아야 되는 이유를 줍니다.

이런 여러가지 시스템이 게임 자체의 볼륨이 작은데도 오래 플레이를 할수 있는 게임으로 만들어주는것 같네요.게임자체 난이도도 없어서 몇회차 할필요도 없구요.그리고 만약 영어 음성말고 일본어 음성을 하실분들은 비추드리네요. 연기를 너~~~~~~무 못해요..오히려 엑스트라가 연기를 더 잘함...특히 여주인공 아마추어 같음.

35465457.review:
The art was what attracted me to this game and now that I can play it, I love it.
Turn based rpg for those of us who love them. One can think it will be boring with time. Well for now I am not.
They combine "old school" japanese rpg style with western rpg ideas. And it works.

What I like : 
- different loot rarities (white, green, purple...) and crafting (most of the loot in battles - not too much gold)
- no infinite mana/health (you can regen at the inn and encounters on the map respawn so you can "farm") so you need to manage your team and the mana mechanics >
- > combat mechanic : basic quick attacks which usually bring "excess free mana" you can use before using your mana pool for charging slower attacks
- Visible turn order changing depending on actions
- Nice fishing mini game

What I don't like :
Nothing ? But if I had to say one thing it would be long and slow movement on the map when you clear its encounters. But I think teleporters will be activated when I advance in the story (already found three)

35465409.review:
Cercavo da tempo un RPG con combattimenti a turni che fosse prevalentemente improntato sugli scontri e Battle Chasers è proprio il gioco giusto!
Lo stile grafico, le animazioni e i menù sono veramente ben fatti e piacevoli.
L'esplorazione, il crafting  e il gameplay mi hanno convinto da subito e ho giocato 2 ore filate senza perdere un attimo l'entusiasmo.

35465096.review:
-2D的手绘游戏画风很好看，个人非常喜欢，再次证明不是一定是全3D的游戏才叫好的画面
-非常有趣的回合制RPG，每个角色的技能天赋丰富而又特色，过载系统可以让你每场战斗能使用技能的同时，而又不会过度消耗蓝条导致BOSS战战力不足，战斗里的每个动作和技能非常有魄力带感
-游戏系统非常有深度，装备有品质之分，各种材料组合起来打造系统可研究的东西很多，随机迷宫内的随机事件很丰富，每个角色还有不同的迷宫技能，越高难度的迷宫的收获越大，传说装备等你拿（这些事看游戏指南里介绍的，还没深玩）
-总而言之是一款各方面都诚意十足的回合RPG，游戏耐玩度很高，比普通独立游戏贵点点的价格是完全可以接受的，个人强烈推荐给回合RPG爱好者
PS.不是回合制游戏没落过时，而是看制作者是否真用心去做了，该游戏水准相比目前在国内的情怀们,后者的可玩性差的不是一星半点，希望国内的还想做回合制的能多学习下其他优秀回合制游戏的优点
该游戏制作者也说过这部游戏的灵感来自日本经典的主机游戏，例如《最终幻想》，《幻想水浒传》，《时空之轮》和《梦幻之星》等等作品。包含地下城探索，JRPG式回合制战斗，随机生成内容等等

35463641.review:
UPDATE: I've done a complete 180 on this game. It definitely suffers from taking too long to show what's interesting about it, but if you have the patience to get there, oh boy. It's probably the most engaging JRPG combat I've ever played. 

The combat is dynamic, actually values status effects, and feels like a little puzzle every fight. I'd say more, but I've got to go back to playing. I usually get SO BORED by classic JRPGs, but Battle Chasers makes combat and character-building interesting enough to keep me excited to play.

I'm leaving my old review here, because I think it's still valid criticism of the first few hours of the game.


OLD REVIEW:

[i]TL;DR: If you're like me and, 1. don't know anything about Battle Chasers, and 2. don't have any particular nostalgia for JRPGs past, this game might not do enough differently or interestingly to keep your attention.[/i]

Seems perfectly competent, but unfortunately, in a sea of exceptional games and limited time, competent isn't enough for me.

The art style and animations pulled me in, but in the first 1.5 hours, there was nothing to keep me there. The story seems really bland, and it isn't told in an interesting way (first red flag was the game opening with a big expository wall of text introducing you to all the characters unnaturally--honestly, if you had just completely cut that, the game would have been fine and I would have been more intrigued about these characters with the intro cutscene as the first introduction). 

Combat works, but doesn't have an interesting enough twist on tired JRPG tropes to make me want to explore it further. The overcharging is a nice addition, but isn't enough to make combat truly interestly; Bravely Default's system of sacrificing and taking an advance on turns is an example of a twist that's interesting enough to carry the game. 

This is probably personal prefence, but I also think that the overcharging-type mechanic has already been done better in Persona Q, in which every character [i]starts[/i] every fight with an "overcharge" of mana to use. In that scenario, it encourages using your fun abilities from the getgo, even in short fights, which makes the combat more interesting in the early game while still maintaining the long-term resource management of a permanent mana store.

I understand that I've played less than two hours and can't expect the game to show me its full hand in that time, but--especially in such a saturated genre and ESPECIALLY on a platform that only lets you return games that you've played for less than a couple hours--it really shouldn't take that long for the game to get interesting. In 90 minutes, I rarely used anything other than basic attacks in combat, and I'm not willing to risk missing the refund window in hopes of it getting more interesting. If the narrative (or even just the premise) were interesting, maybe I'd push through. But right now, it's just the art. And I can look at pictures of the art without having to mash A through a bunch of slow, uninteresting fights.

Also, this is minor, I suppose, but for a game with such pretty visuals, I'd expect those same levels of quality to carry over into the UI/menus (especially for a genre in which navigating menus is the primary gameplay interaction), but the menus were really bland and borderline ugly. We're living in a post-Persona 5 world; bare minimum for JRPG menus is not gonna cut it. 

Overall, I could see myself coming back to this when I'm out of games to play, but with all the amazing stuff coming out, that may be a while.

35463505.review:
Bon alors pour casser le cliché, je ne suis absolument pas fan de comics ou quoi ce soit, ce qui ne m'empêche pas d'apprécier grandement le jeu. 

La bande son est vraiment plaisante, assez changeante suivant les donjons et les maps. Concernant les adaptations audio c'est le top, le travail est de qualité et qui plus est on peut aussi choisir d'avoir une bande audio en japonais par exemple et les dialogues écrits en Français, bref c'est hyper plaisant.

Visuellement bon on reconnait la patte de Joe Mad, Grace Liu aux décors c'est une tuerie. Le gros bémol c'est la map générale sur laquelle on se déplace. En effet je trouve que visuellement elle tranche dans le mauvais sens du terme, la finition laisse à désirer, ça fait plutôt grossier. De plus, on est obligé d'emprunter des chemins préalablements tracés, ça fait vraiment penser à des déplacement à la héroes and might and magic pour les connaisseurs, et je trouve ça assez dommage que l'on ne puisse pas disposer d'une pleine liberté de mouvement. 

Concernant les donjons, les décors sont vraiment extra, il y a plein de super bonnes idées ci et là. Sans être d'une difficulté extrême ça offre un peu de défi. Le bémol est cette mini map assez étrange qui schématise les zones sous forme de carrés. C'est un parti pris assez bizarre et question lisibilité ce n'est pas tout le temps le top.

Le systême de craft a l'air assez intéressant aussi et surtout riche. Il y a pas mal d'artisans, bref de quoi bien occuper son temps pour optimiser l'équipement et rouler sur les donjons en difficulté max. Toujours en contrepartie il faut aller un peu aux quatre coin de la map, dans certains donjons etc pour opimiser son équipement et ça devient vite le bordel.

Bon l'histoire, par moment elle fait un peu prétexte à... cependant chaque héro rentre dans un archétype bien particulier et à ce niveau là ça fonctionne du feu de dieu. En parlant de héros encore une fois un parti pris assez étrange : la team avec laquelle on joue est composée de 3 héros, 5 sont jouables. Pour effectuer les rotations obligé d'aller à l'auberge... je trouve ça aussi un peu dommage.

Pour synthétiser je recommande ce jeu, ne serait ce que pour la patte visuelle et son ambiance sonore. En gros une expérience bien immersive avec laquelle vous allez resortir avec des étoiles dans les yeux. Les contres, c'est cette espèce de rigité et de manque d'ergonomie par moment. Dans l'ensemble ça vaut vraiment le coup.

A essayer avec un pad Xbox pour le moment, car à priori au clavier c'est pas la peine en létat actuel des choses sur la version pc.

35462144.review:
So far, I'm finding myself pleasantly surprised at about 5 hours in.

An obvious throwback to old JRPG's, reminscent of Chrono Trigger and the FF series. However! It's been polished and updated for modernity, featuring an interesting take on the ol' turn-based combat and a much needed new interpretation of the 'world map, all of which makes it feel fresh versus what I expected to be just a plain homage to JRPG nostalgia. Plus, you get the ARPG-ish randomly generated dungeons and tons of looting and, most importantly, FISHING!

Art style is a unique steampunk/fantasy and it is fantastic. Soundtrack is an understated brilliance. Narrative is nothing groundbreaking yet. It runs buttery smooth and I have yet to encounter a single bug, minor or otherwise; the level of polish is impressive.

It really ain't bad for $30.

35461767.review:
Actualmente 3 horas de juego, he hecho una mazmorra y poco más y esta es mi valoración

Graficamente el juego es muy atractivo, la estetica general, los combates, los movimientos de las skills...

Perfectamente traducido al castellano, incluidas voces, durante las escenas y fuera de ellas

Mecanicas del juego:

Por un lado el combate, donde tenemos habilidades básicas, y otras que podriamos llamar "magias". Las primeras suelen recargar una barra tipo furia que nos sirve como mana extra, lo que hace que en combates largos tengamos que aplicar el tempo de cuando recargar mana con habilidades basicas y cuando gastarlo
Las habilidades y daños son sencillas y perfectamente explicadas, cuando daño haces, cuanto modificas una estadistica, etc. Desde el principio surgen varias formas de combatir, no te vas a limitar a siempre el mismo estilo de combate si no quieres

Por otro lado la evolucion de personaje y leveleo. 
Al subir de nivel desbloqueas nuevas skills, ya sean basicas o de las que consumen mana. Además tendrás unos puntos de atributo para repartir en diferentes mejoras para tu personaje
El sistema de equipo me parece simplemente genial. Han implementado en un juego tipo final fantasy un equipamiento como el del wow o el diablo (con sistema de colores blanco, verde, azul, morado), donde los loteos de los cofres es aleatorio, asi como las mejoras que te otorgaran el equipamiento. Podras de esta forma diseñar tu mismo a los personajes, mejorandoles unos atributos u otros, y añadiendoles unas habilidades pasivas u otras
Además a base de derrotar enemigos ganaras conocmiento sobre las mismas, y cuando llegues a X muertes, te darán un bonus para todo tu grupo
Al entrar en una mazmorra tu mismo elegiras la dificultad, y segun la pongas la recompensa final sera diferente (objetos de mayor rareza)


La historia he de reconocer que de momento me parece una historia basica al uso, pero con lo bien hecho que esta el juego engancha muchisimo
